title: What is $$70th$$ percentile?
text: Find the $$70th$$ percentile means to find the score k such that 70% of scores are below k and 30% of the scores are above k.

title: Probability area under the curve
text: Let $$k=the$$ $$70th$$ percentile. What is $$P\left(x<k\right)$$ equal to? Consider the Total area under the normal distributed curve is 1.

title: Consider the Total area under the normal distributed curve is 1.
